thread.title: Trump says 'long way' to go on North Korea crisis

title: Trump says 'long way' to go on North Korea crisis
text:
Trump says 'long way' to go on North Korea crisis 12:32am IST - 01:01 
U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday the North Korean nuclear crisis is a long way from being resolved, a day after the North pledged to end its nuclear tests. Nathan Frandino reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday the North Korean nuclear crisis is a long way from being resolved, a day after the North pledged to end its nuclear tests. Nathan Frandino reports.
